name: Asphalt Motorcycle Speed Dash
description:
Take your motorcycle on super speed ride through constantly changing traffic. Do you have the reflexes to survive? Or will you crash and burn? See if you have what it takes to reach TOP SPEED!

HOW TO PLAY

- Tilt your phone/tablet to steer left and right
- Stay away from walls and other obstacles on the road

FEATURES:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming
